title: America's Hauntings - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/17/21
itunes:title: America's Hauntings - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/17/21
description:
George Noory and author Troy Taylor explore his research into ghosts and hauntings, including his own personal ghost sighting, plus the background into the story of a 13 year old boy allegedly possessed by a demon that was adapted into the famous horror movie "The Exorcist."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion of some of America's greatest hauntings, including the story that inspired "The Exorcist."
